function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Competing policy frames leading to conflicting approaches to climate and public health crises.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on subsidiarity principle for eu-wide response to climate change impacts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Institutional challenges in implementing the green deal","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"National self-interest hindering european solutions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impediment to the implementation of the egd due to covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed initiatives and assessments due to covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary lifting of state aid rules as part of initial economic response to covid-19 crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The global covid-19 pandemic poses a risk to the health and well-being of individuals worldwide, including the eu and its member states.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The social and economic impacts of covid-19 can have widespread effects on livelihoods and economic stability in partner countries.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of effective public health measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and accountability in government decisions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political exploitation of emergency powers for personal or party gain","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited press freedom and threat of jail time for reporting on the virus","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict measures and lockdown may have been eased too early","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"State of emergency and unlimited power to rule by decree","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contested measures in the use of esm and austerity measures evoke memories of the punitive regime forced on greece during the eurozone crisis.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consolidation of authoritarian powers under president viktor orbán and the ruling fidesz party in hungary due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal economic responses to covid-19 crisis between prosperous and poorer eu member states.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversy over the use of corona bonds and the european stability mechanism esm to finance recoveries.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fraught and contested use of the european stability mechanism esm for financing emergency health costs.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inhibition of centralised control of medical countermeasures by member states’ insistence on separating health law and eu internal market law.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relative weakness of the ecdc compared to international counterparts , cdc and discrepancies between member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retreat to national self-interest in a time of crisis leading to discrepancies in member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between public health authorities and governments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in equipment sharing and resource allocation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unplanned emergency response and lack of preparedness","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited eu health mandate hindered public health responses to covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global epicentre of the pandemic shifting to europe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow and haphazard initial reaction by the eu","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited mandate on public health for the eu","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political and economic debates about financial recovery instruments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Member states’ political opportunism complicating response to covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hesitation that the execution of the european green deal egd may fail or not meet the scale of the climate challenge","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political challenges to the implementation of the egd, including opt-outs by member states and tight timelines for introducing the climate law","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Polarized opinion on the egd even before the onset of the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread through imported products and services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public funding for egd initiatives may not prioritize health and safety measures to prevent disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate investment in green initiatives may lead to environmental conditions that increase disease transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global carbon emissions reduction targets not met","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to integrate existing environmental policies","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for carbon-dependent member states in transitioning to renewable energy","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic transcends borders","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stalled progress on major measures announced in the european green deal egd","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for greater integration and stronger eu-level institutions for covid-19 response","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to movement control and lockdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of finance due to running cost and wages while project jobs are halted","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Restriction on labor affecting productivity and work progress","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contractors suffering a loss of income due to payment suspension during mco","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in national economy leads to reduced job opportunities for contractors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor shortage and delay in materials supply due to covid-19 impact","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
